participant_1.background:
I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid.
I ride my bike to class, and I visit animal shelters to give the animals some love.
i need extra iron in my diet.
my weekends are spent studying and looking over client files.
I have been struggling with my mental health recently.

participant_2.background:
I'm a writer who loves to tell stories about my favorite super heroes.
I play classical music on my violin to relax after a long day of teaching lessons.
i have many girlfriends.
I keep my body and mind active through yoga and meditation.
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love animals and the outdoors.

content.text: Hi, I'm looking for a new friend.
Hi there, I'm always looking for new friends too! What are your interests?
I love reading and visiting animal shelters. I also like to ride my bike.
That's great! I love reading too, especially stories about my favorite superheroes. I also enjoy playing classical music on my violin and practicing yoga and meditation.
Oh, that's cool! I used to play the violin when I was younger, but I haven't played in a long time.
You should pick it up again! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I might just do that. I've been looking for a way to improve my mental health.
That's great to hear! I'm glad I could help.
No problem! So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to the library and check out some books.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to spend the weekend writing a new story about my favorite superhero.
Oh, that sounds exciting! I'd love to read it when you're finished.
Sure, I'll send you a copy.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
